resources.string: The Blocks Hostel would love to hear any feedback; positive or negative about us. All your feedback will be utilised to help improve the services which The Blocks Hostel provides.

Keep It Simple Travel (KIST) is a company combining the world of budget travel and technology together. Our aim is to create a vast network of budget travel information, then connect this information with people interested in budget travel through innovative technology.

Here at Keep It Simple Travel we have developed a streamlined mobile application platform which we call the KIST App Platform. The platform has been specifically designed by our team to cater for backpacker hostels.
The team is a group of long term friends that are passionate about budget travel and technology. This passion is why we choose to specialize in hostel mobile app development.
"For more information or any questions please email us a Info@keepitsimpletravel.com
